title: Claudiu Vaișcovici
text: Claudiu Vaișcovici (born 14 October 1962) is a Romanian retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>, who played for <a href="FC%20Sportul%20Studen%C8%9Besc%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Sportul Studențesc</a>, <a href="FCM%20Dun%C4%83rea%20Gala%C8%9Bi">Dunărea Galați</a>, <a href="FC%20O%C8%9Belul%20Gala%C8%9Bi">Oțelul Galați</a>, <a href="Victoria%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Victoria București</a>, <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Dinamo București</a>, <a href="Bursaspor">Bursaspor</a>, <a href="FC%20Zimbru%20Chi%C8%99in%C4%83u">Zimbru Chișinău</a> and <a href="FC%20Progresul%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Progresul București</a>.
